summary: This module defines a lightweight Chainlit application that presents interactive UI controls—such as a model selector, temperature slider, and streaming toggle—to configure an AI chat agent. It includes helper routines for initializing the agent with the chosen settings and launching the chat interface, supporting end‑to‑end testing of chat configuration features.
business_intent: Enable users or testers to dynamically adjust chat model parameters through a simple web UI, facilitating demonstration, testing, and fine‑tuning of AI conversational agents.
